attributes.action: Public demand for instant dismissal and prosecution for the fraudulent expense claims by politicians
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A facebook group started for members of the public who are outraged at the fraudulent expense claims by several politicians, has found that alot of the public feel cheated and angered by this. Had it have been any other hard working citizen, the company would have instantly dismissed them for gross misconduct and taken legal action for theft/fraud, therefore we feel that in this case the country that has been cheated on by it's leaders is "the company" and want to see those in question being treated as we would, and will not except an apology and offer to pay the money back. YES pay the money back but back into what you took it from, any public funding.

rejection.details: The Attorney General's office have advised us that the PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way. Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have the discretion whether to investigate the matter or not, and the CPS have discretion on how to proceed following an investigation. The PM also cannot dismiss MPs. Government does not control who sits in Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
